alp.core
Class Signal

java.lang.Object
  DirectedSparseEdge
      alp.core.Signal

public class Signal
extends DirectedSparseEdge

A directed edge between Components. The default constructors creates a single bit signal with STD_LOGIC type

Version:
September, 2007
Author:
Ricardo Menotti, Author Page, DC UFSCar
See Also:
Design, Port
